name: Aquarium Surprise!
description:
Aquarium Surprise is a student game made in one week and the CNAM-ENJMIN for the cognitive disabled people from the association "l'enfant soleil". For the event, the wiimote was placed in a cube made out of wood.

You control an interactive aquarium that you can shake and move thanks to a Wiimote. When the character goes on the little lights it changes the color of the cube. 

Try it, move it and have fun with this little toy ! 

Play with a Wiimote or a mouse to move the cube.

The team: 

Management: Coralie Feniello

Game Design: Theo Verpillat

Sound Design: Louis Naudin

Programming: Jorge Nogueira, Séverin Michaut, Louis Emard and Ardant Sebastien

3D Artists: Romane Garcia, Rémi Le Gallo-Le Manach, Meryem Erikci
